constraints.description: Competency tests require 80% of points to pass
Username cannot be changed after creation
Be careful not to copy extra spaces into password
Studying one lesson takes approximately 5-15 minutes
Complete final test and feedback survey to receive certificate
All competency tests must be passed to complete course
